record.field: The field %(field)s on contracts cannot be set by a data rule. Please fix the contract data rule on product %(product)s.
You cannot activate a contract that is not in quote or hold status.
No contract found.
No contract selected.
The party %(party)s can not be erased because it is on the following active contracts: %(contracts)s
The party %(party)s can not be erased because it is on the following quotes: %(quotes)s
The party %(party)s can not be erased because its following terminated contracts have not exceeded their shelf life: %(contracts)s
Create Contract Notification
WARNING: The PYSON Condition is applied on contract.
Activation Periods "%(first)s" and "%(second)s" overlap.
No quote sequence defined.
Cannot change start date, multiple activation period detected.
Cannot set end date anterior to start date.
Invalid file format.
Cannot reactivate contract, end reached.
Cannot reactivate contract, max end date reached.
Cannot reactivate a not yet terminated contract.
No contact defined for %(type)s.
Invalid start date for first %(type)s contact.
Invalid end date for last %(type)s contact.
Contact start date (%(date)s) incompatible with associated address (%(address)s) start (%(address_date)s).
Contact end date (%(date)s) incompatible with associated address (%(address)s) end (%(address_date)s).
There are dates for which no %(type)s address is defined.
Deletion not allowed because the contracts %(contracts)s are not quote or declined.
Coverage %(coverage)s is inactive at date %(date)s.
End date should be posterior to start date: %(start_date)s for option %(option)s in contract %(contract)s
End date should be anterior to end date of contract: %(end_date)s for option %(option)s in contract %(contract)s.
End date should be anterior to option automatic end date : %(end_date)s for option %(option)s in contract %(contract)s.
Option %(option)s manual start date %(manual_start_date)s is anterior to contract initial start date %(start_date)s in contract %(contract)s.
The computed end date for option %(option)s is less than its start date, it will be automatically declined.
There are overlapping coverages for %(parent)s.
You're not allowed to manage options if the contract status not quote.
